title: The King Yella Interview: Lil Durk Dissing Him, Cardi B, Becoming a YouTuber & More
description:
In this brand new fire interview, #KingYella talks about staying away from beefs, moving out of Chicago, Youtube family channel, and reacts to every crazy sus question Adam has for him!

-----
00:00 Intro
2:36 Getting sh*t in 2016, being stuck in Chicago
4:09 Music beefs have real lives repercussions in the hood
5:46 Why does Durk keep perpetuating this type of message while real ppl get repercussions?15:15 Yella says Cardi B is the reason the Migos broke up
22:13 The goal is to make money and get out of the hood 
23:16 Duck used to say that he wouldn't leave Chicago
26:45 Yella says: "Dudes get k___ in Chicago coz they can’t fight"
37:35 Yella could listen to Durk's music if he thinks it's fire
40:14 Yella doesn't wanna listen to vi*lent music anymore
42:00 Yella met his girl while he was in jail through IG
47:27 Media don't send out statements when they're wrong like in the Doodie Lo situation
51:30 Not choosing sides on the whole Kevo vs 16ShotEm situation
55:00 O'block turning into a tourist attraction
57:09 Youngboy doing a feature with Lil Nas X and Makonnen
59:53 The case of Lil Jay, Yella gives his take
1:14:58 Rico Recklezz switched up on Yella when he got clout
1:22:55 600 Breezy declined the fight with Yella
1:23:00 Yella still call Kevo a sex symbol and a ninja turtle

-----
